articles.title: Azmatullah takes two wickets in two balls as Australia falter
articles.description: Afghanistan's Azmatullah Omarzai takes the huge wickets of Australia's David Warner and Josh Inglis in two balls at the Cricket World Cup.
articles.content:

articles.author: Heinz Schenk
articles.title: Bavuma hardly the first SA skipper to struggle at Word Cup, but history shows it tends to end badly
articles.description: Temba Bavuma is in the spotlight again regarding his form at a Cricket World Cup as the Proteas build towards the semi-finals, and history is a pointer for how urgently this needs to be rectified.
articles.content:
AHMEDABAD - It would seem that Temba Bavuma's fate in his cricketing life is to hog the spotlight for all the wrong reasons.
